test_cases.expected_result: The email input field should have a placeholder text 'Enter your email'
The password input field should have a placeholder text 'Enter your password'
The 'Login' button should be disabled until both email and password fields are filled
The 'Forgot Password?' link should be present and clickable below the password field
The 'Sign Up' button should be present and clickable for new users
The login page should be accessible and meet accessibility guidelines
The login page should handle invalid or missing data properly (e.g. empty fields, incorrect email/password)
The login page should handle edge cases (e.g. very long email/password, special characters)
